level.heading: WAIVER OF THE EDUCATION AND IDP REQUIREMENTS (ยง 17-3404)

level.text: 3404.1 The Board may exempt an applicant from the education and IDPequirements when the applicant holds a current and valid certification issuedy NCARB, and the applicant submits to the Board satisfactory evidence of suchertification.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 7266, 7270 (Dec. 29,1995); Finalulemaking published at 55 DCR 5454, 5458 (May 9, 2008).
